CreeperEye:
CreeperEye is not just a simple puzzle map in Minecraft, it's more like a game in a game. With over 20 challeging puzzles, mazes, parkour and much more fun. There are also over 20 hidden enderpearls, this will be your score! We will update the map as much as possible, just to get rid of all bugs and typos. You should definantly give this map a go!






2.jpg (17.89 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2011-11-28 03:55 上传








规则：

 Play on peaceful.
设置到和平。

 You can't break blocks except for wool.
你不可以破坏方块，除了羊毛。

 You CAN'T throw, place or use wool.
你不可以丢，或者用羊毛。

 But you CAN throw, place or use other items you find in chests.
但是你可以丢弃，放置，或者使用你在箱子中找到的物品。

 You may craft if needed.
如果需要你可以自己做。

 You can break things you placed except for buttons, levers and pressure plates.
你可以破坏掉你放置的方块，除了按钮，开关，和压力板。

 You CAN'T throw enderpearls to teleport!
你不能使用Enderpearls传送到Ender世界

 Find as many enderpearls as you can, this is your score. You can't throw or use them.
找到ENDER珍珠用来计分，你不能扔掉或者用掉它们。

 Don't use hacks or cheats.
不要作弊。

 HAVE FUN!
玩的开心！



DBANK下载地址：http://dl.dbank.com/c00453fx65


PS：感谢帮助我英语翻译的版主……ORZ……
